# Hybrid Architectures.
# Real-World Impact.

**I build AI systems that scale on the Cloud and execute on the Edge.**

From **autonomous drones** (Edge AI) to **carbon-aware schedulers** (AWS), my work bridges the gap between massive cloud compute and constrained industrial hardware.
